name: @peckhamcc/lambda-send-payment
description: Makes a Stripe charge to the passed token
author: Alex Potsides

scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/@peckhamcc/config && mkdir node_modules/@peckhamcc/config && cp ../config/index.js node_modules/@peckhamcc/config && echo BT_MERCHANT_ACCOUNT_ID=$BT_MERCHANT_ACCOUNT_ID > deploy.env && echo BT_ENVIRONMENT=$BT_ENVIRONMENT > deploy.env && echo BT_MERCHANT_ID=$BT_MERCHANT_ID > deploy.env && echo BT_PUBLIC_KEY=$BT_PUBLIC_KEY > deploy.env && echo BT_PRIVATE_KEY=$BT_PRIVATE_KEY > deploy.env && node-lambda deploy --role arn:aws:iam::614175028878:role/service-role/send-payment-role --region eu-west-2
